question:
Consider the following Statements regarding the Office of Economic Advisor(OEA):
  1. It is attached to the Ministry of Finance.
  2. The weekly compilation and Publication of Wholesale Price Indices (WPI) is done by the Office of Economic Advisor.
Which of the Statement(s) given above is/are correct?
explanation:
It is attached to the Ministry of Finance.
This is not a correct statement.Â The Office of the Economic Advisor (OEA) is an attached office of the Ministry of Commerce & Industry.
The weekly compilation and Publication of Wholesale Price Indices (WPI) is done by the Office of Economic Advisor.
This is a correct statement.
